bibl.title: The Hellenistic Rulers and Their Poets. Silencing Dangerous Critics?
bibl.note: Expanded version of a paper given on 2 November 1995 at the University of St. Andrews, and on 3 November 1995 during the "Leeds Latin Seminar" on "Epigrams and Politics".
